questions.question: Example question text. Was this helpful?
What goes into the "questions" field in the quiz.json files?
responses: The list of questions with responses & the correct answers included

questions.question: What goes into the "question" field in questions list in the quiz.json files?
responses: The list of questions with responses & the correct answers included

questions.question: What goes into the "responses" field in questions list in the quiz.json files?
responses: The available options for the question

questions.question: What goes into the "answer" field in questions list in the quiz.json files?
responses: The correct answer, with 0 being the first option and 3 being the 4th & last option
